CustomBehavior.Text: Levels 31-90 haven't been scripted yet. I am stopping the bot
Checking my current level..
I am in the 12 to 14 bracket, changing to the newest farming location.
Position check, The Crossroads in Northern Barrens.
Moving to the innkeep at The Crossroads.
I have reached the innkeeper.
Setting my Heartstone.
Moving to the new farming location.
I have reached the farming location. I'll farm this location until I reach level 14.
Checking my free bag slots and gear's durability.
I have determined that I have less than 4 empty bag slots left or my gear is below 30% durability. Going to hearth, repair and mail.
